verbs.description: seahawks [V: could] be sold in wake of paul allen death the seattle seahawks lost arguably the most important person in franchise history on monday with the news that owner paul allen had died from non - hodgkins lymphoma just two weeks after he announced that he was ready and hopeful for his second bout against cancer seattle seahawks paul allen bill gates
